title: Chinese Stocks on Track for Best Year Since 2017 as Rally Widens
description: Chinese stocks look set for their strongest showing since 2017, after a technology-driven bull run broadened out to include companies from gold miners to drug makers.

title: Meta to Acquire Startup Manus, Adding Agents to Bolster AI Bet
description: Meta Platforms Inc. has agreed to acquire Singapore-based AI startup Manus, adding a popular artificial intelligence agent as the social-media company works to build a business around its massive AI investment.

title: China’s Reawakening Puts Asia M&A on Confident Course for 2026
description: The buoyant mood around deals is reverberating through Asia, with major markets like China picking up the pace after a spell in the doldrums and Japan turning in record volumes.
